title: Fox's party; Christmas buns [Greek Dialogue] [Compilation]
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Mrs Rena Frangioudakis reads stories in Greek to a group of seven years olds. These stories are from the many titles published as resource material for the Greek Curriculum.
